column3: I don't think mocktime makes sense for any chain that's shared amongst untrusted peers; ie setting mocktime on testnet and the default signet wouldn't make sense. If you use -regtest when you've got trusted peers (it's quicker than a custom signet) and a custom signet when you have untrusted peers (since -regtest is trivial to abuse), then the "mocktime only on -regtest" is a perfect match.
